definition: to keep stationed (of troops)/to remain as a garrison
to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)

sentences.english: Here soldiers with bows and arrows were left to defend the Wall.
sentences.chinese: 士兵們帶着弓箭留駐在這裏保衛長城。

sentences.english: Keep me in Ur heart again.
sentences.chinese: 請把我再次留駐在你心尖。
